channel.title: Comments on: K’s Top Albums of 2008

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Thanks, Karen. I appreciate the correction. I hadn't seen that article on Pitchfork. Like I said, I still listen to the hell out of the Crystal Castles record, so aside from coloring my opinion of them, it didn't prevent me from listening.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Karen. I appreciate the correction. I hadn’t seen that article on Pitchfork. Like I said, I still listen to the hell out of the Crystal Castles record, so aside from coloring my opinion of them, it didn’t prevent me from listening.

item.title: By: Karen O
item.dc:creator: Karen O
item.description:
Crystal Castles only ripped off 1 song in an unreleased song 5 years ago, it was made 4 years before their debut album and never released or performed. Fake controversy created by chiptune artists who were jealous of CC's small success. Even Pitchfork says the accusations are bullshit:
http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/news/51349-crystal-castles-respond-to-chip-music-controversy
item.content:encoded:
Crystal Castles only ripped off 1 song in an unreleased song 5 years ago, it was made 4 years before their debut album and never released or performed. Fake controversy created by chiptune artists who were jealous of CC’s small success. Even Pitchfork says the accusations are bullshit:

http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/news/51349-crystal-castles-respond-to-chip-music-controversy

item.title: By: Logan K. Young
item.dc:creator: Logan K. Young
item.description: i'm still kicking myself for missing the M83 and School of Seven Bells show in Charlotte. I might catch the former when they come back around with The Killers...maybe. Didn't even hear "Wermland" though. I agree, "Paper Float" is totally kick-ass.
item.content:encoded: i’m still kicking myself for missing the M83 and School of Seven Bells show in Charlotte. I might catch the former when they come back around with The Killers…maybe. Didn’t even hear “Wermland” though. I agree, “Paper Float” is totally kick-ass.

item.title: By: Lizzie
item.dc:creator: Lizzie
item.description:
pretty nice list. thanks for Lykke Li recommendation earlier this year.
give TVOR a listen and a London winter is the perfect time to get into Bon Iver.
item.content:encoded:
pretty nice list.
thanks for Lykke Li recommendation earlier this year.

give TVOR a listen and a London winter is the perfect time to get into Bon Iver.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: so true. that santogold record is amazing, but, damn, she whored it out. every time i see an ad the background music is santogold. she's the moby of 2008. i forgot about she & him too. i liked that record.
item.content:encoded: so true. that santogold record is amazing, but, damn, she whored it out. every time i see an ad the background music is santogold. she’s the moby of 2008. i forgot about she & him too. i liked that record.

item.title: By: Scott Wells
item.dc:creator: Scott Wells
item.description: The only thing I understood in this whole piece is <em>Oxford comma</em> and I don't approve. Getting old sucks. (Actually, I know and approve of synth and pop.)
item.content:encoded: The only thing I understood in this whole piece is Oxford comma and I don’t approve. Getting old sucks. (Actually, I know and approve of synth and pop.)
